alert.note: Alert for Colfax; Harding; Mora (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 1:01AM MDT until June 12 at 1:45AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Harding County in northeastern New Mexico... Northeastern Mora County in northeastern New Mexico... South central Colfax County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 145 AM MDT. * At 101 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles north of Wagon Mound, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springer. This includes Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 393 and 423. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
